author: Ben Kamisar
title: Governors warn shortages will put their states in 'dire straits' as early as this week
description: The Coronavirus Task Force coordinator, Dr. Deborah Birx, advised states to pursue all options to procure equipment.
content:
Michigan Governor Gretchen Whitmer and Louisiana Governor John Bel Edwards appear on "Meet the Press" on March 29, 2020.NBC News
WASHINGTON Two governors of states seeing a surge in coronavirus cases sounded the alarm Sunday about the lack of resources to re… [+8832 chars]
